skills.label: Manage databases
items: May include but not limited to: plan mailbox database requirements, create mailbox databases, configure mailbox databases, troubleshoot mailbox databases

skills.label: Manage Database Availability Groups (DAGs)
items: May include but not limited to: plan dag settings and members, create a dag, manage dag members, deploy and manage site resilience, test a database and datacenter failover scenario, troubleshoot dag problems, evaluate exchange services health

skills.label: Manage and implement client access
items: May include but not limited to: plan namespaces, plan high availability for client access, configure virtual directories and urls, configure client access policies, configure global outlook web app (owa) policies, configure autodiscover for exchange, troubleshoot client access connectivity problems, manage exchange certificates lifecycle

skills.label: Manage disaster recovery
items: May include but not limited to: plan backup and recovery strategy, implement and perform backups, restore servers, databases, and mailboxes

skills.label: Manage messaging infrastructure lifecycle
items: May include but not limited to: plan exchange server installation, prepare active directory (ad) for exchange, install and update exchange services

skills.label: Plan the Transport Pipeline
items: May include but not limited to: plan transport architecture, design for multi-site mail flow, plan a high availability mail flow solution

skills.label: Manage Connectors
items: May include but not limited to: plan connectors, create send and receive connectors, configure connectors

skills.label: Manage Mail Flow
items: May include but not limited to: manage transport rules, manage domains, implement a multi-site mail flow

skills.label: Troubleshoot mail flow problems
items: May include but not limited to: validate inbound and outbound mail flow, examine message trace, configure message tracking, analyze message headers with the remote connectivity analyzer, handle non-deliverable reports (ndrs), investigate transport logs, monitor mail flow

skills.label: Manage recipient resources
items: May include but not limited to: manage archive mailboxes, manage resource mailboxes, manage groups, manage mailboxes, manage mailbox permissions, configure mailbox policies, manage shared mailboxes, evaluate license options

skills.label: Manage mobile devices
items: May include but not limited to: configure mobile device mailbox policies, manage mobile device access
